task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)
task.shareWithOrganizationDescription: Only members of your organization can access
task.sharePubliclyDescription: Anyone with the link can access
task.connectToCloudDescription: Sign in to Roo Code Cloud to share tasks
task.openInCloud: Open task in Roo Code Cloud
task.openInCloudIntro: Keep monitoring or interacting with Roo from anywhere. Scan, click or copy to open.

about: Generate, refactor, and debug code with AI assistance. Check out our <DocsLink>documentation</DocsLink> to learn more.
onboarding: Your task list in this workspace is empty.

boomerangTasks.title: Task Orchestration
boomerangTasks.description: Split tasks into smaller, manageable parts

stickyModels.title: Sticky Models
stickyModels.description: Each mode remembers your last used model

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Allow the AI to solve problems by browsing the web, running commands, and more

customizableModes.title: Customizable Modes
customizableModes.description: Specialized personas with their own behaviors and assigned models

modeSelector.title: Modes
modeSelector.description: Specialized personas that tailor Roo's behavior.

enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

instructions.wantsToFetch: Roo wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Roo wants to read this file
fileOperations.wantsToReadMultiple: Roo wants to read multiple files
fileOperations.wantsToReadAndXMore: Roo wants to read this file and {{count}} more
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: Roo wants to read this file outside of the workspace
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: Roo wants to edit this file
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: Roo wants to edit this file outside of the workspace
fileOperations.wantsToEditProtected: Roo wants to edit a protected configuration file
fileOperations.wantsToApplyBatchChanges: Roo wants to apply changes to multiple files
fileOperations.wantsToGenerateImage: Roo wants to generate an image
fileOperations.wantsToGenerateImageOutsideWorkspace: Roo wants to generate an image outside of the workspace
fileOperations.wantsToGenerateImageProtected: Roo wants to generate an image in a protected location
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: Roo wants to create a new file
fileOperations.wantsToSearchReplace: Roo wants to search and replace in this file
fileOperations.didSearchReplace: Roo performed search and replace on this file
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: Roo wants to insert content into this file
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: Roo wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: Roo wants to append content to the end of this file

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: Roo wants to view the top level files in this directory
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: Roo viewed the top level files in this directory
directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: Roo wants to view the top level files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: Roo viewed the top level files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: Roo wants to recursively view all files in this directory
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Roo recursively viewed all files in this directory
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: Roo wants to recursively view all files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.didViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: Roo recursively viewed all files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: Roo wants to view source code definition names used in this directory
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: Roo viewed source code definition names used in this directory
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitionsOutsideWorkspace: Roo wants to view source code definition names used in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitionsOutsideWorkspace: Roo viewed source code definition names used in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: Roo wants to search this directory for {{regex}}
directoryOperations.wantsToSearchOutsideWorkspace: Roo wants to search this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}
directoryOperations.didSearchOutsideWorkspace: Roo searched this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}

codebaseSearch.wantsToSearch: Roo wants to search the codebase for {{query}}
codebaseSearch.wantsToSearchWithPath: Roo wants to search the codebase for {{query}} in {{path}}

mcp.wantsToUseTool: Roo wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Roo wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server

modes.wantsToSwitch: Roo wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Roo wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: Roo wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode
subtasks.wantsToFinish: Roo wants to finish this subtask
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve
autoApprove.description: Run these actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust.
autoApprove.selectOptionsFirst: Select at least one option below to enable auto-approval

stealthModel.feature: <bold>Limited-time FREE stealth model</bold> - Code Supernova: A versatile agentic coding model that supports image inputs, accessible through Roo Code Cloud.
stealthModel.note: (Note: prompts and completions are logged by the model creator and used to improve the model)
stealthModel.selectModel: Select roo/code-supernova from the Roo Code Cloud provider in Settings to get started.

followUpSuggest.copyToInput: Copy to input (same as shift + click)

browser.rooWantsToUse: Roo wants to use the browser

systemPromptWarning: WARNING: Custom system prompt override active. This can severely break functionality and cause unpredictable behavior.
profileViolationWarning: The current profile isn't compatible with your organization's settings

shellIntegration.title: Command Execution Warning
shellIntegration.description: Your command is being executed without VSCode terminal shell integration. To suppress this warning you can disable shell integration in the Terminal section of the Roo Code settings or troubleshoot VSCode terminal integration using the link below.
shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Click here for shell integration documentation.

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Request Limit Reached
autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: Roo has reached the auto-approved limit of {{count}} API request(s). Would you like to reset the count and proceed with the task?

autoApprovedCostLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Cost Limit Reached
autoApprovedCostLimitReached.description: Roo has reached the auto-approved cost limit of ${{count}}. Would you like to reset the cost and proceed with the task?

versionIndicator.ariaLabel: Version {{version}} - Click to view release notes

slashCommands.title: Slash Commands
slashCommands.description: Use built-in slash commands or create custom ones for quick access to frequently used prompts and workflows. <DocsLink>Docs</DocsLink>

deleteDialog.title: Delete Command
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the command "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

slashCommand.wantsToRun: Roo wants to run a slash command
